description: Fetch attributes of a traffic policy resource.

parameters.name: TrafficPolicyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the traffic policy resource.

nested_items.name: CreatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the traffic policy was created.

nested_items.name: DefaultAction
nested_items.description: The default action of the traffic policy.

nested_items.name: LastUpdatedTimestamp
nested_items.description: The timestamp of when the traffic policy was last updated.

nested_items.name: MaxMessageSizeBytes
nested_items.description: The maximum message size in bytes of email which is allowed in by this traffic policy--anything larger will be blocked.

nested_items.name: PolicyStatements
nested_items.description: The list of conditions which are in the traffic policy resource.

nested_items.name: Action
nested_items.description: The action that informs a traffic policy resource to either allow or block the email if it matches a condition in the policy statement.

nested_items.name: Conditions
nested_items.description: The list of conditions to apply to incoming messages for filtering email traffic.

nested_items.name: BooleanExpression
nested_items.description: This represents a boolean type condition matching on the incoming mail. It performs the boolean operation configured in --Operator' and evaluates the --Protocol' object against the --Value'.

nested_items.name: Analyzer
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Add On.

nested_items.name: ResultField
nested_items.description: The returned value from an Add On.

nested_items.name: IsInAddressList
nested_items.description: The structure type for a boolean condition that provides the address lists to evaluate incoming traffic on.

nested_items.name: AddressLists
nested_items.description: The address lists that will be used for evaluation.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The email attribute that needs to be evaluated against the address list.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The matching operator for a boolean condition expression.

nested_items.name: IpExpression
nested_items.description: This represents an IP based condition matching on the incoming mail. It performs the operation configured in --Operator' and evaluates the --Protocol' object against the --Value'.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: An enum type representing the allowed attribute types for an IP condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The matching operator for an IP condition expression.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The right hand side argument of an IP condition expression.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Ipv6Expression
nested_items.description: This represents an IPv6 based condition matching on the incoming mail. It performs the operation configured in --Operator' and evaluates the --Protocol' object against the --Value'.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: An enum type representing the allowed attribute types for an IPv6 condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The matching operator for an IPv6 condition expression.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The right hand side argument of an IPv6 condition expression.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: StringExpression
nested_items.description: This represents a string based condition matching on the incoming mail. It performs the string operation configured in --Operator' and evaluates the --Protocol' object against the --Value'.

nested_items.name: Analyzer
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an Add On.

nested_items.name: ResultField
nested_items.description: The returned value from an Add On.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The enum type representing the allowed attribute types for a string condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The matching operator for a string condition expression.

nested_items.name: Values
nested_items.description: The right hand side argument of a string condition expression.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: TlsExpression
nested_items.description: This represents a TLS based condition matching on the incoming mail. It performs the operation configured in --Operator' and evaluates the --Protocol' object against the --Value'.

nested_items.name: Attribute
nested_items.description: The enum type representing the allowed attribute types for the TLS condition.

nested_items.name: Operator
nested_items.description: The matching operator for a TLS condition expression.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The right hand side argument of a TLS condition expression.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicyArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the traffic policy resource.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicyId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the traffic policy resource.

nested_items.name: TrafficPolicyName
nested_items.description: A user-friendly name for the traffic policy resource.
